name: Brand My Login
author: Muhammad Alnajlat

sections.description:
Light, fast and easy-to-use plugin for branding WordPress login page by setting your brand logo and theme color and extra simple styles.

What you can do with Brand My Login:

  • The simplest things you need to brand your login page.
sections.installation:
Upload Brand My Login plugin to your blog, Activate it.

  • Related admin submenu will be under “Appearance” menu.
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Fix – Register form style when border is set.

1.2.0

  • Feature – Controlling logo image size.
  • Addition – Settings link in plugins page of admin area.
  • Addintion – “Visit login page” link in settings page of the plugin.

1.0.4

  • Fix – Logo background when border is set.
  • Update – Logo size in admin area settings.

1.0.3

  • Fix – Logo size and position.

1.0.2

  • Fix – Preiew login page source URL in admin area.
  • Fix – Logo size.

1.0.1

  • Fix – Preiew login page source URL in admin area to avoid other plugins effects on login page url.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Brand and style your WordPress login page quickly and lightly.
